   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to saturnx's documentation!
===================================

**saturnx** is a Python library to perform timing analysis of data from
X-ray observatories.

 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

.. note:

   This project is under active development
